üì¶ Bookmarklet Collections

Import multiple bookmarklets at once

How to Import Collections

Chrome

  1. Download a collection file by clicking "Download"
  2. Open chrome://settings/importData in Chrome
  3. Select "Bookmarks HTML File" from the import options
  4. Choose the downloaded HTML file

Edge

  1. Download a collection file by clicking "Download"
  2. Open edge://settings/importData in Edge
  3. Select "Favorites or Bookmarks HTML File" from the import options
  4. Choose the downloaded HTML file
